channel.title: Cybersecurity on NS News and Views
channel.description: Recent content in Cybersecurity on NS News and Views

item.title: How to spot internet scams and fake emails
item.description: Recently I decided to hold a short(ish) staff training session on how to spot internet / email scams. The catalyst behind this, was primarily due to the sheer amount of helpdesk queries being received, pertaining to whether a particular website or email was genuine etc.
